skillTree.name: Lord of the Deeps
skillTree.description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Obstinacy
skillTree.description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.name: Obdurate
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Locus of Power
skillTree.description: The dense power exuded from the old runelord dampens any enemy magics hurled at Dawi nearby.

ui_effects.description: ➕Enemy casters within range suffer minor miscast explosion when casting

skillTree.name: Labour of Love
skillTree.description: Kragg rarely emerges from the Underhalls of Karaz-a-Karak, preferring instead to labour secretly on his lore, which he jealously guards.

skillTree.name: Runes of Warding
skillTree.description: When Kragg goes to war he brings with him some of the finest rune items he has created.

skillTree.name: Finding the Successor
skillTree.description: Perhaps one day he will find a worthy successor, but so far no one has proven themselves, much to the chagrin of many an aspiring Runesmith.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +5 for Runesmiths
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Ancestral Guards
skillTree.description: Kragg is accompanied to the battlefield by Ancestral Guards who have sworn binding oaths of protection.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Longbeards and Hammerers units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Longbeards and Hammerers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Oldest Runelord
skillTree.description: Kragg the Grim is by far the oldest living Runesmith - only rivaled in power by a certain Thorek Ironbrow.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Master Rune of Kragg"
Shared cooldown: -15% for all Rune Magic
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"

skillTree.name: Damping
skillTree.description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(local region)
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.name: Rune of Hearth & Home
skillTree.description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

skillTree.name: Wardbreaker
skillTree.description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!

effects.description:
Spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

Missile resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Axe Lord
skillTree.description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tradition & Innovation
skillTree.description: The Dawi continually push the boundaries of engineering, be it by soaring ever higher in their flying contraptions or firing projectiles farther than ever before.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fire & Fury
skillTree.description: Only Dwarfen forges burn hotter than those unfortunates caught in the blaze of Dawi ingenuity.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grimnir's Heirs
skillTree.description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Thunderer
skillTree.description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Grungni
skillTree.description: Those who pass the trials of the Ancestor God have proven their honour without question.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dawi Firepower
skillTree.description: None know the strength of the Dawi better than those who've suffered their firepower firsthand.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honoured by Grimnir
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs worship Grimnir, but only a select few warriors receive his personal recognition.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Morgrim’s Favoured
skillTree.description: Morgrim's favour is not handed out on a whim; this god blesses only the truest disciples of Dawi engineering.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Enquiring Mind
skillTree.description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Master Rune of Balance
skillTree.description: Forged in the embers of a captured book of spells, this rune hungers after the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -8 per turn
	(local region)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Master Rune of Passage
skillTree.description: This rune causes rocks, vegetation, snow and mud to become easily passable.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.name: Master Rune of Defence
skillTree.description: Created to help guard stronghold gates (the first being those of Karaz-a-Karak), this rune has since been used on many other devices.

effects.description:
Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.name: Master Rune of Valaya
skillTree.description: This ancient rune was invented by Valaya herself, the Ancestor Goddess of the Dwarfs and founder of Karaz-a-Karak.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Master Runelord
skillTree.description: When a Master Runelord judges the time is right, he chooses a young relative to be his apprentice and reticently teaches him, for an apprentice has to prove his worthiness to wring out even the most basic steps of the craft from his Master.

effects.description:
Hero recruitment cost: -30% for Runesmiths
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: King's Guard
skillTree.description: "If you're not on the list, you're not coming in!"

skillTree.name: Inspirational Leader
skillTree.description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

skillTree.name: Pure-Beard
skillTree.description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: The Grim
backgroundSkills.description: Kragg is the oldest and by far the most powerful living Runesmith - a gnarled old Dwarf, strong and enduring as a weather-beaten oak.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -15% for all Rune Magic

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

items.name: Kragg's Armour
items.description: Kragg's armour is forged from heavy gromril. Over the years the Runelord has laboured long and hard on it, turning each separate component into a lovingly crafted work of art.

items.name: Kragg's Runestaff
items.description: This ancient staff of oak is adorned with the skull of a minotaur which Kragg slew while still a youth of just a hundred winters. The Skull has been coated in brass to preserve it.

items.name: Kragg's Hammer
items.description: Kragg forged his hammer when he was still a young Runesmith, it bears Kragg's own hidden and secret rune. It heats up the hammer till it glows red hot and then transfers the heat to whatever it hits. It also drives the hammer forward with crushing force. The hammer is so hot that any enemies affected by fire are affected by the hammer as if it were actually burning.
